title: Ticket #5165: Have .run files for tests which are written in python
description:
The goal is to move python unit tests out of the build and into the tests. .RUN files to this date have all been perl.

Status so far is that we can have a run file written in python where the return determines pass or fail. This work ongoing
check_ins: 2015-Jul-20 16:53   Check-in [45362]: Take early python work and stash it within condor_tests #5165 (By Bill Taylor )
creator: bt
